content.query:
--https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/develop-tables-external-tables?tabs=hadoop
--Hadoop type:
    -- type parameter in Data Source is HAdoop
    -- Uses java tech to read from external files 
    --Available only in Dediated pools 
--Native type
    -- type parameter in Data Source is not metioned
    -- Uses Azure's native C++ tech to read from external files


--Native external tables are good interms of performane as it takes less time to read the files when compared to Hadoop type extenal table
